channel.title: Replanting rule
channel.description:
Should be removed, people shouldn't be able to take others crops at all it should be considered griefing. I think it should be removed because with the new hunger bar (more noticeable in world 2 because of the border limit) people are just continually taking my crops and replanting and I'm not actually getting any wheat to make food therefore dieing of hunger.
In world 1 it's okay because nobody even goes online there and everyone is 15,000 blocks apart but with world 2 there isn't much point even attempting to harvest crops (at least not near me).
Unrelated: Anyone found any desert biomes? I'm on great need of cactus to get rid of those spiders! (w2)

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Indeed, when can you get a world map going?

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The great thing about the new map, is it’s about a 5 minute trip to anywhere, about 10 minutes max from edge to edge.

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Thanks, I’ll drop by once I’ve finished mine and deathschaos9s epic rich cool house. I suppose that would work but I need cacti eventually anyway so may as well get some.

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Plenty of cacti all around my house, I went exploring and found yours, just head towards spawn from your house in a boat, pass spawn and you will hit a desert, my house is the only one there, it’s not that big of a desert, so you should see it. I’d prefer if you didn’t harvest whole cacti though (all 3), because if you just harvest 2 from all of them, then they will grow back.

Can’t you build an over-hang though to stop spiders? I thought they couldn’t climb upside-down?

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I like eating the food, though it doesn’t kill you I’m a great user of the sprint option. It also gets rid of the spiders because they keep climbing over my walls, so cactus on the top stops them doing it, also thanks but I have no idea where you live though

I spend most of my time outside my house, so dieing isn’t an option.

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That sounds OK to me. Also, I live in a desert biome, and you can have some of my cacti, if you tell me what cacti have to do with getting rid of spiders?

(to get to my house, just head the opposite direction that you are looking when you go through the portal until you hit the edge, you will see my home)

edit:
I changed the rule, but don’t be too harsh until everyone knows about it, alright?

edit2:
You do realize that hunger does not kill you ever right? Also, I find it easier to just die in my own house than to make food and eat it.

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Should be considered griefing.

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

It seems like a long 30 minutes, but there isn’t any need for people to be taking others crops anyhow. The map is literally full to the rims with that annoying grass so it’s really easy to setup a farm.

Many people have crappy computers (like myself) so when we come on we have to stop everything we’re doing then load it all up, so we can’t come on every 30 minutes and harvest our crops because we have things to do.

I’m posting this from experience, I’ve gotten 22 wheat from my farm because people keep taking it up to now. Person A replants > Person B takes and replants > Person C takes and replants > Person B comes back takes and replants loop.

So when I come on the next day I have some crappy wheat which has just been planted.

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It shouldn’t take that long to grow really, if you’re offline it should grow within like 30 minutes shouldnt it?

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Davidi2:

No replanting while the player is online? I dunno

people shouldn’t be able to take them at all, what’s the point of people making a farm if they’re not actually getting anything from it? Unless someone can be online 24/7 then it won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Replanting rule
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No replanting while the player is online? I dunno

Read full topic
